metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0500 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Curl_smtp_escape_eob in lib/smtp.c in curl 7.54.1 to and including curl 7.60.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow that might be exploitable by an attacker who can control the data that curl transmits over SMTP with certain settings (i.e., use of a nonstandard --limit-rate argument or CURLOPT_BUFFERSIZE value).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.8
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.8
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.8
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.8
No subscription required
